amendment.description: To clarify and recommend changes to the policy of the United States on Iraq and to require reports on certain matters relating to Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5219 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 322.

action.text: Amendment SA 2519 proposed by Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S12669-12670; text: CR S12669-12670) To clarify and recommend changes to the policy of the United States on Iraq and to require reports on certain matters relating to Iraq.
